description: Try our easy to follow Deli Tarts with Goats Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Deli Tarts with Goats Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheet frozen puff pastry, just thawed
200g roasted capsicum, cut into thin strips
200g chargrilled eggplant, cut into thin strips
200g marinated artichokes, cut into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Lightly grease a 12-hole medium muffin tin. Cut 10cm circles from pastry and press into muffin holes.
Mix ricotta and parmesan in a medium bowl. Season with pepper. Divide mixture into pastry shells.
Arrange capsicum, artichokes and eggplant on top of cheese mixture. Bake for 25 minutes until puffed and golden. Top with rocket leaves and goats cheese.
